entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 except minus 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17 except minus 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 7 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023
